content.query:
--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹                 
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_DimEmployee
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO wwi.DimEmployee
(EmployeeKey 1, WWIEmployeeID 2, Employee 3, PreferredName 4, IsSalesperson 5, ValidFrom 6, ValidTo 7, LineageKey 8)
FROM 'https://synapsedemos.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/WWI/wwi-dimemployee.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIELDQUOTE = '"'
	,FIELDTERMINATOR = '|'
	,FIRSTROW = 2
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://synapsedemos.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/'
	,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM wwi.DimEmployee
GO


--alter table wwi.DimEmployee
--alter column IsSalesperson nvarchar(5) not null
